capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape is indeed an adult. I've had my fair share of run-ins with him in the Hogwarts years, and let me tell you, he's not someone to be underestimated. His age may have been a factor in his behavior towards Harry Potter, but that doesn't excuse it. Still, as an adult, Snape's actions were those of a grown man, and I suppose that's what makes them all the more complicated.
